name: Pixel Balls
description:
A small 2D game I'm working on.

Made in Unity for anyone who wants to know without downloading

Have fun with the game if you want!

YOU WILL NO LONGER RESTART IF YOU DIE!!!!!!

1.2 has:

20 levels
Death Screen
Spikes to kill you
Wall of spikes that chase you on some levels
and a end goal.

(FULL VERSION NOT FREE)
